      • newObjectFromJSONObject

        public static Resource newObjectFromJSONObject(org.json.JSONObject dataObject,
                                               java.util.List<Resource> included)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Deserializes a json object of data to the registered class.
        Parameters:
        dataObject - JSONObject from data
        included - List<Resource> from includes to automatic match them.
        Returns:
        Deserialized Object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when deserializer is not able to create instance.

      • newObjectFromJSONArray

        public static java.util.List<Resource> newObjectFromJSONArray(org.json.JSONArray dataArray,
                                                              java.util.List<Resource> included)
                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Loops through data objects and deserializes them.
        Parameters:
        dataArray - JSONArray of the data node.
        included - List<Resource> from includes to automatic match them.
        Returns:
        List of deserialized objects.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when deserializer is not able to create instance.
